lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Galen Crew
[00:01.000] 作词 : Galen Crew
[00:29.330]in the year of our lord 1239
[00:33.800]there once lived a girl of a royal line
[00:37.930]the ancient stories do recall ?
[00:42.180]she was the fairest of them all
[00:47.080]in a castle made of stone
[00:50.770]every night she slept alone
[00:55.280]any noise that would raise the dead
[00:59.110]couldn't wake her sleepyhead
[01:26.620]a stranger came from a foreign land
[01:30.770]asking for the maiden's hand
[01:34.790]her father said no go away
[01:39.020]she's gonna marry a king one day
[01:43.890]the stranger he came back again
[01:47.840]riding with 10 thousand men
[01:51.970]Their battle cries filled all with dread
[01:55.600]but couldn't wake her sleepyhead
[02:23.500]the fighting lasted all day long
[02:27.520]but the castle walls were thick and strong
[02:31.700]the stranger cried let her decide
[02:35.940]where her true affections lie
[02:40.650]so the king knocked on her door
[02:44.970]only you can end this war
[02:49.060]no one knows how the story ends
[02:52.820]did she ever wake again?
[02:56.640]will she ever wake again?
tlyric:
[00:29.330]公元1239年
[00:33.800]有一位有着王室血统的女孩
[00:37.930]根据古老的故事所讲述的
[00:42.180]她是最美的(女孩)
[00:47.080]在石制的城堡里
[00:50.770]她每晚独自长眠
[00:55.280]任何连亡者都能惊醒的声音
[00:59.110]都无法唤醒她
[01:26.620]遥远的国度来了一位陌生人
[01:30.770]希望与她结为连理
[01:34.790]她的父亲说，不行，走开
[01:39.020]她某天终会嫁给一个国王
[01:43.890]那个陌生人离开后又回来了
[01:47.840]带着一万兵马
[01:51.970]战斗的呼喊能吓破胆
[01:55.600]但还是无法唤醒她
[02:23.500]战斗持续了一整天
[02:27.520]但城堡的墙壁又厚又强
[02:31.700]陌生人高喊，让她决定吧
[02:35.940]她的心意究竟属于谁
[02:40.650]于是国王敲响了她的门
[02:44.970]只有你能结束这场战争 (国王对公主所说的话)
[02:49.060]没人知道这个故事的结尾
[02:52.820]她醒来了么?
[02:56.640]她还会醒来么?
